title: Brightspace API configuration
description: The schema of Brightspace API configuration data.

appId.description: The application identifier used to identify the application to the LMS back-end.

appKey.description: The application key used to generate application signatures.

lmsUrl.description: The LMS hostname to which API requests are sent.

clientAppUrl.description: The application redirect URL to which users are redirected after completing authentication on the LMS.

leVersion.description: The Learning Environment product version to use.

lpVersion.description: The Learning Platform product version to use.
